name: The Other Hero
description:
The Other Hero!

Hey! Listen! Do you like exploring a dungeon!? Do you like enemies! And do you just want to check out a Zelda inspired game!?
Then 'The Other Hero' is right up your alley!
Legend tells of a game that was made in a mere week. This game was said to be a fun little experience were you play as someone else than the chosen one!
You heard me right, you are not the chosen one. Just some regular ol' bloke looking for some riches.
"WHAT'S THE FUN IN THAT!?"
Woah! Calm down there boy! Our hero might not have a sword of masters, or a fairy by his side. But what he does have is some BUFF muscles! You heard me right! He punches his way through his problems.
Because he isn't just any kind of hero. He is The Other Hero.
